name: Space Mayhem (2D Shooter)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project .

Modifications are as follows:

  1. Added 3 Different levels for this Project.
  2. Modified the Background (Added Asteroids, Planets, etc in the background ).
  3. Changed Title of Game in MainMenu.
  4. Increased Size & Health of some Enemy .
